LabelText: Document suspicious email activity (rule changes, forwarding, unusual messages)
Identify the compromised mailbox and users potentially impacted
Reset the mailbox password and revoke all active sessions and app passwords
Review mailbox rules, forwarding settings, and delegates for malicious changes
Search for fraudulent messages sent from the compromised account
Notify recipients of fraudulent messages and instruct them not to act on them
Enable or verify MFA on the affected account and other high-value accounts
Coordinate with finance, legal, and leadership if payment fraud is suspected
Document the incident, message samples, and remediation steps
